Posts.Content: Jun 17, 2017 06:25AM mlany wrote: im 17, and for about 3 years ive felt a pain that is specific to just one little spot on the left side of my left breast. it hasnt grown, and i feel discomfort when i lay on that side and pain when i touch it. im worried. if it was breast cancer, would it grow and would i have already noticed more problems? because it has stayed the same for 3 years. thank
